mapper.select: select *,(SELECT username FROM sys_user where creator_id = user_id) as creator_name ,(SELECT username FROM sys_user where modifier_id = user_id) as modifier_name ,(SELECT warehouse_name FROM wms_warehouse where wms_transfer_order.warehouse_code = wms_warehouse.warehouse_code) as warehouse_name ,(SELECT warehouse_name FROM wms_warehouse where wms_transfer_order.sour_warehouse_code = wms_warehouse.warehouse_code) as sour_warehouse_name ,(SELECT warehouse_name FROM wms_warehouse where wms_transfer_order.dest_warehouse_code = wms_warehouse.warehouse_code) as dest_warehouse_name from wms_transfer_order where to_id = #{value}
